Theodor Corraidhín (tc@example.com) has invited you to contribute to their study:

Test inviting study

on the Médecins Sans Frontières ReMIT website.

You can click this link:

http://example.com/studies/1/outputs/new?token=invite-token

at any time and there you'll find forms to describe any disseminations or other impact this study has had.

Many thanks,

MSF ReMIT team.
